Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the Biden administration labeled Libertarians as terrorists when there is no evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the Biden administration labeled Libertarians as terrorists.
Problematic assumption: The claim is based on the assumption that a statement made by former CIA director John Brennan implies that the Biden administration will target libertarians as domestic terrorists, which is not substantiated.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Biden did not single out libertarians as terrorists in his speeches or actions.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in this claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by relying on a misinterpretation of a statement made by John Brennan and lacks sufficient evidence to support its assertion.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not explore alternative explanations for the statements made by John Brennan or the actions of the Biden administration.
